alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 8:50AM EST until February 19 at 12:21PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following creeks in Indiana... Sugar Creek near Edinburgh Youngs Creek at Amity Mill Creek near Cataract Big Walnut Creek near Reelsville Wildcat Creek near Jerome and at Kokomo .Brief flooding is expected to continue through much of the day for many of the smaller creeks across central Indiana. The most severe flooding will be at Amity where flooding within a foot of moderate flood stage is ongoing and will continue. Other sites will generally remain within a foot or two feet of flood stage and have either crested or nearly crested. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Youngs Creek at Amity. * WHEN...From this morning to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Johnson County Roads 350 S and 400 S west of US 31 are closed by flood waters. Upstream in Youngs Creek watershed, flooding of city of Franklin parks with flood waters possibly 3 feet deep in some areas. CR 200 N at CR 75 W on northwest side of Franklin and CR 250 S west of US 31 closed by high water. Amity ditch is out of its banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM EST Friday the stage was 9.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 AM EST Friday was 9.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 6.2 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued this morning by around 1100 AM EST.
